Articles.Content:
Why do parts just explode when they collide? Even with parts that don’t even have any sort of flammable material! Sure the crash might cause a few sparks here and there but not a massive fireball! And in space at that!

Is there something wrong with my game install? I think the game is not registering space correctly.

That's because there's only one ingame explosion model. All parts have it. Its weird to watch a strut blow up like a box of C4, but you get used to it. Some parts also explode more violently than others. There's nothing wrong with your game.

Contrary to what many people might want to make you believe, KSP is actually... a game (<gasp> I know!). Ultimately born from strapping little puppets to fireworks and watching them blow up for fun (<GASP> I know!!!).

We all like to play at being extremely serious scientists and engineers... but really, it's just a game. Axploshuns! <cue audience chuckle soundtrack>

Welcome to the forum! Any screenies/videos to share of your explos... I mean, your craft?

 

P.S.: obligatory pointing out very seriously that if your parts are exploding, you're 'doing it wrong'...
